validation_item: Tier 1 questions cannot be skipped without explicit Unknown/Prefer-not-to-say.
Red flags appear early and do not block intake.
Unknown vitals generate assistant actions in clinician view.
Clinician always sees top 5 diagnoses with probabilities and confidence labels.
Patient UI never shows diagnoses/probabilities; patient emails avoid probabilities.
Completing assistant actions triggers immediate re-triage and updates outputs.
Low confidence generates follow-up questions limited to a reasonable number.
Clinician can set final diagnosis, plan, follow-up instructions.
Draft email generated from plan; attachments selectable; routing available.
All clinician/staff actions and sensitive data access create audit events.
Headers, README, and UI footer include igotnowifi, LLC attribution.
